13759.en:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>...Don't you see? The fountain is enshadowed. Now,
if you were to touch the Lamplight Tree, your heart
would be defiled.<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13759.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>「……わからないか？　泉の　かげりが。
　今　ともしびの木に触れれば
　お前の心は　けがされてしまうぞ。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13759.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>: ……샘이 탁해진 걸 못 느꼈나?
　지금 등불 나무를 만졌다간
　네 마음까지 부정해질 거다.<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13759.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>……你没看到泉水的阴影吗？
现在只要碰触灯火之树，
你的内心就会受到污染。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13759.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>……你沒看到泉水的陰影嗎？
現在只要碰觸燈火之樹，
你的內心就會受到汙染。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13760.en:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>Zahokku! Right away, let us commence the purification
ceremony.<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13760.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>「ザホック！
　すぐに　浄化の儀を始めよう。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13760.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>: 자호크!
　당장 정화 의식을 시작하자.<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13760.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>扎霍克！
立即开始净化仪式。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13760.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>札霍克！
立即開始淨化儀式。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13761.en: <start_lip_sync n00789 _normal m00001>Certainly, Priestess Helga.<stop_lip_animation n00789 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13761.ja: <start_lip_sync n00789 _normal m00001>「かしこまりました　ヘルガ僧正。<stop_lip_animation n00789 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13761.ko: <start_lip_sync n00789 _normal m00001>: 알겠습니다, 헬가 승정님.<stop_lip_animation n00789 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13761.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n00789 _normal m00001>是，历雅僧正。<stop_lip_animation n00789 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13761.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n00789 _normal m00001>是，赫爾嘉僧正。<stop_lip_animation n00789 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13762.en: <start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>The Goddess' Mirror reflects the light...<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13762.ja: <start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>「神の鏡が　映すは光……。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13762.ko: <start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>: 신의 거울이 빛을 비추니…….<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13762.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>神之镜映照着光芒……<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13762.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>神之鏡映照著光芒……<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13763.en:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>O shadow... Return to the dark night from whence you
came!<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13763.ja: <start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>「影よ……　闇夜のもとへ帰れ！<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13763.ko: <start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>: 그림자여…… 어둠 속으로 물러가라!<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13763.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>阴影啊……回到黑暗当中去吧！<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13763.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>陰影啊……回到暗夜中吧！<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13764.en: <start_lip_sync n00789 _normal m00001>Did it work?<stop_lip_animation n00789 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13764.ja: <start_lip_sync n00789 _normal m00001>「成功でしょうか？<stop_lip_animation n00789 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13764.ko: <start_lip_sync n00789 _normal m00001>: 성공하신 겁니까?<stop_lip_animation n00789 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13764.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n00789 _normal m00001>成功了吗？<stop_lip_animation n00789 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13764.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n00789 _normal m00001>成功了嗎？<stop_lip_animation n00789 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13765.en:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>Yes. The purification was successful. I shall borrow
a branch to take back to the incense maker.<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13765.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>「ああ。浄化は　無事に終わった。
　枝を１本　拝借して
　あの香術師に　持ちかえってやるとしよう。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13765.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>: 그래, 정화는 무사히 끝났다.
　가지를 하나 꺾어
　그 향술사에게 가져다주기로 하지.<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13765.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>嗯，净化顺利结束了。
取一根树枝
带给那个香术师好了。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13765.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>嗯，淨化順利結束了。
取１根樹枝
帶給那個香術師好了。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13766.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>……那么接下来。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13767.en: <start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>Who are you? Why have you come to such a place?<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13767.ja: <start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>「お前は　誰だ？　なぜ　こんな所へ？<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13767.ko: <start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>: 넌 누구냐? 왜 이런 곳에 있는 거지?<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13767.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>你是谁？为什么到这种地方来？<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13767.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>你是誰？為什麼到這種地方來？<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13768.en:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>...I see. <pc>, you claim to have come here
at the incense maker's request, who was concerned
for me.<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13768.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>「……なるほどな。
　<pc>　お前は　あの香術師に頼まれ
　私の身を案じて　ここへ来たというのか。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13768.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>: ……그래.
　<pc>, 넌 그 향술사의 부탁으로
　내 안부를 확인하기 위해 이곳에 온 거로군.<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13768.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>……原来如此。
<pc>，你是受香术师委托
为了保护我而来的啊。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13768.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>……原來如此。
<pc>，你是受香術師委託，
前來保護我的啊。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13769.en: <start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>I very much appreciate your efforts.<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13769.ja: <start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>「それは　また　ご苦労なことだ。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13769.ko: <start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>: 고생스러웠을 텐데 고맙다.<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13769.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>那真是辛苦你了。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13769.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>那真是辛苦你了。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13770.en:
<start_lip_sync n00789 _normal m00001><pc>, we noticed the Mirror Fountain had
become enshadowed while preparing for the purification
ceremony.<stop_lip_animation n00789 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13770.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00789 _normal m00001>「<pc>さん。
　我らは　みかがみの泉の　かげりに気づいて
　浄化の儀の　準備をしていたのですよ。<stop_lip_animation n00789 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13770.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00789 _normal m00001>: <pc> 씨,
　저희는 거울의 샘이 탁해진 것을 깨닫고
　정화 의식을 준비하고 있었던 거랍니다.<stop_lip_animation n00789 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13770.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00789 _normal m00001><pc>，
我们之前发现了御镜之泉的阴影，
所以去为净化仪式做准备了。<stop_lip_animation n00789 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13770.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00789 _normal m00001><pc>，
我們之前發現了水鏡之泉的陰影，
所以正在為淨化儀式做準備。<stop_lip_animation n00789 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13771.en:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>I don't know how you came to know of such a place,
but, at a time like this, happening upon someone like
you must have been the Goddess' will.<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13771.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>「どうやって　この場所を知り得たか　わからぬが
　こんな時に　お前のような者と出会えたのは
　神の　ご意志かもしれない。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13771.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>: 어떻게 이곳의 위치를 알았는진 모르겠지만
　이런 시기에 너 같은 이와 만난 것은
　신의 안배일지도 모르겠군.<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13771.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>虽然不知道你是怎么找到这里的，
不过，在这种时候能遇到你，
或许是神的指引呢。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13771.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>雖然不知道你是怎麼找到這裡的，
不過，在這種時候能遇到你，
或許是神的指引。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13772.en:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>Now then, our task is finished. Let us return to
Kirika Shrine in Azlan. <pc>, you should
come too.<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13772.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>「さて。用も　済んだことだ。
　アズランの　キリカ聖堂に戻るとしよう。
　<pc>。お前も　来るといい。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13772.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>: 그럼 볼일은 마쳤으니
　아즐란의 키리카 성당으로 돌아가지.
　<pc>, 너도 따라와라.<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13772.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>好了，事情也办完了。
我们回安须岚的雾迦教堂。
<pc>，你也一起来吧。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13772.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>好了，事情也辦完了。
我們回安須嵐的霧迦聖堂。
<pc>，你也一起來吧。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13773.ja: <start_lip_sync n00795 _normal m00001>「ややっ　<pc>さん！<stop_lip_animation n00795 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13773.ko: <start_lip_sync n00795 _normal m00001>: 아이고, <pc> 씨!<stop_lip_animation n00795 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13774.en:
<start_lip_sync n00795 _normal m00001>I heard from Priestess Helga. In the end, it seems that
there was no need to worry... Sorry for the trouble
I put you through.<stop_lip_animation n00795 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13774.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00795 _normal m00001>「ヘルガ僧正から　話は聞きました。
　結局　いらぬ心配だったようで……
　いやはや　ご迷惑を　おかけしました。<stop_lip_animation n00795 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13774.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00795 _normal m00001>: 헬가 승정님께 말씀 들었습니다.
　제가 괜한 걱정을 한 것 같더군요……
　이거 참, 번거롭게 해서 죄송합니다.<stop_lip_animation n00795 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13774.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00795 _normal m00001>我听历雅僧正说了。
我的担心看来是多余的……
真是给你添麻烦了。<stop_lip_animation n00795 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13774.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00795 _normal m00001>我聽赫爾嘉僧正說了。
看來我的擔心是多餘的……
真是給你添麻煩了。<stop_lip_animation n00795 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13775.en: <start_lip_sync n00795 _normal m00001>Still, by the Goddess' grace, I got the Lamplight wood!<stop_lip_animation n00795 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13775.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00795 _normal m00001>「でも　おかげさまで
　無事に　ともしびの木が　手に入りました！<stop_lip_animation n00795 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13775.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00795 _normal m00001>: 하지만 덕분에
　무사히 등불 나무를 손에 넣었습니다!<stop_lip_animation n00795 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13775.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00795 _normal m00001>不过，多亏了你，
我成功拿到了灯火之树！<stop_lip_animation n00795 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13775.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00795 _normal m00001>不過，多虧了你，
我成功拿到了燈火之樹！<stop_lip_animation n00795 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13776.en:
<start_lip_sync n00795 _normal m00001>Here, has a nice aroma, doesn't it? It's said that the
aroma of the Lamplight Tree is the bane of monsters.<stop_lip_animation n00795 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13776.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00795 _normal m00001>「ほらっ　いい香りでしょう？
　この　ともしびの木の香りが
　魔物は　大の苦手なんだそうです。<stop_lip_animation n00795 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13776.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00795 _normal m00001>: 어떻습니까? 아주 향기롭죠?
　마물들은 이 등불 나무의 향기를
　무척이나 싫어한다고 하더군요.<stop_lip_animation n00795 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13776.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00795 _normal m00001>你闻，
很香吧？
怪物最怕灯火之树的香味了。<stop_lip_animation n00795 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13776.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00795 _normal m00001>你聞，很香吧？
怪物似乎非常討厭
這個燈火之樹的香味。<stop_lip_animation n00795 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13777.en:
<start_lip_sync n00795 _normal m00001>With this, one can enter the forest without worry!
...Speaking of, medicinal herb gatherers would be
very pleased to have this.<stop_lip_animation n00795 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13777.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00795 _normal m00001>「これがあれば　森に入っても安心！
　……ということで　薬草摘みの方に
　たいへん　よろこんでいただけるんですよ。<stop_lip_animation n00795 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13777.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00795 _normal m00001>: 이것만 있으면 숲에서도 걱정 뚝!
　그러다 보니 약초꾼분들이
　아주 반색을 한답니다.<stop_lip_animation n00795 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13777.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00795 _normal m00001>有了它就能安心进入森林了！
……因此，这东西深受
采集药草的人欢迎。<stop_lip_animation n00795 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13777.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00795 _normal m00001>有了它就能安心進入森林了！
……因此，這東西深受
採集藥草的人歡迎。<stop_lip_animation n00795 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13778.en:
<start_lip_sync n00795 _normal m00001>Oops, my bad. <pc>, Priestess Helga looks
like she wants to speak with you.<stop_lip_animation n00795 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13778.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00795 _normal m00001>「おっと　いけません。
　<pc>さんに　ヘルガ僧正から
　お話が　あるそうですよ。<stop_lip_animation n00795 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13778.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00795 _normal m00001>: 어이쿠, 이럴 때가 아니지.
　헬가 승정님께서 <pc> 씨께
　할 얘기가 있으시다더군요.<stop_lip_animation n00795 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13778.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00795 _normal m00001>哦，对了。
历雅僧正好像有话
要对<pc>说。<stop_lip_animation n00795 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13778.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00795 _normal m00001>喔，對了。
赫爾嘉僧正好像有話
要對<pc>說。<stop_lip_animation n00795 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13779.en:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>I heard, <pc>, that you wish to be initiated
into our Kirika Order.<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13779.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>「聞いたぞ　<pc>。
　我らが　キリカ修道会への入門を
　望んでいるそうだな。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13779.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>: 얘기 들었다, <pc>.
　우리 키리카 수도회에
　들어오고 싶다고?<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13779.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>我听说了哦，<pc>。
你似乎想要加入
我们雾迦修道会啊。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13779.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>我聽說了，<pc>。
你似乎想要加入
我們霧迦修道會啊。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13780.en:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>You have already shown me your power. I shall
recognize you as a priest of the Kirika Order.<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13780.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>「お前のチカラは　すでに見せてもらった。
　キリカ修道会の僧侶として　認めよう。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13780.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>: 네 힘은 이미 확인했으니
　키리카 수도회 입회를 허가하마.<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13780.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>我已经见识过你的能力了。
我认可你成为雾迦修道会的僧侣。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13780.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>我已經見識過你的能力了。
我認可你成為霧迦修道會的僧侶。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13781.en: <start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>High Priest, you don't mind, do you?<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13781.ja: <start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>「大僧正様　かまいませんね？<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13781.ko: <start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>: 대승정님도 괜찮으시죠?<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13781.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>大僧正大人，没有问题吧？<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13781.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>大僧正大人，沒問題吧？<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13782.en:
<if_woman><start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>Yes, yes. Of course... Let's welcome our new sister,
<pc>, here.<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH><else><start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>Yes, yes. Of course... Let's welcome our new brother,
<pc>, here.<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH><endif>
13782.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>「ええ　ええ。もちろんですとも……。
　新たな兄弟　<pc>を
　ここに　迎え入れましょう。<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13782.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>: 예, 물론입니다…….
　우리의 새로운 형제 {pc}|hpp(을,를)
　반갑게 맞아 줍시다.<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13782.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>嗯嗯。当然没有问题……
欢迎我们的
新同门兄弟——<pc>。<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13782.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>嗯嗯，當然沒問題……
歡迎我們的
新同門兄弟──<pc>。<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13783.en:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001><pc>. We, the Kirika Order, under the Great
Eldona's teachings have saved many people from
calamity.<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13783.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>「<pc>。私たち　キリカ修道会は
　大いなる　エルドナ神の教えのもと
　多くの人々を　災いから　救ってきました。<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13783.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>: <pc>, 우리 키리카 수도회는
　위대하신 엘드나 신의 가르침에 따라
　재앙으로부터 많은 이들을 구했습니다.<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13783.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001><pc>。我们雾迦修道会
信仰伟大的埃尔多纳神，
从灾难中拯救了大批的人。<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13783.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001><pc>。我們霧迦修道會
信仰偉大的艾爾多娜神，
從災難中拯救了眾多人。<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13784.en:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>You, too, shall become Goddess Eldona's hand and
carry out grand works. Remember to be all the more
devoted.<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13784.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>「あなたも　エルドナ神の御手となり
　偉大な仕事を　になうのです。
　いっそうの精進を　忘れないように。<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13784.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>: 이제 당신도 엘드나 신의 종으로서
　위대한 소명을 다해야 하니
　부디 한층 더 정진하기 바랍니다.<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13784.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>你也要成为埃尔多纳神的使者，
担负伟大的任务。
请不要忘记日益精进。<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13784.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>你也要成為艾爾多娜神的使者，
肩負偉大的任務。
請不要忘記日益精進。<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13785.en:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>And so, Priestess Helga. I leave you to be
<pc>'s master.<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13785.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>「それから　ヘルガ僧正。
　<pc>の師は　あなたに　まかせます。<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13785.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>: 그리고 헬가 승정님.
　<pc>의 교육은 승정님께 맡기겠습니다.<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13785.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>历雅僧正。
你就是<pc>的师父了。<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13785.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>還有，赫爾嘉僧正。
<pc>就交由妳指導了。<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13786.en: <start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>Yes, High Priest.<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13786.ja: <start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>「はい　大僧正様。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13786.ko: <start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>: 예, 대승정님.<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13786.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>是，大僧正大人。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13786.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>是，大僧正大人。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13787.en:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>...So it shall be. From now on, you will follow my
teachings as your master.<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13787.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>「……そういうわけだ。
　これからは　師である私の教えに従え。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13787.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>: ……대승정님의 말씀 들었지?
　앞으로는 스승인 내 가르침을 따르도록.<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13787.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>……事情就是这样。
从今往后，请听从本师父的教导。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13787.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>……事情就是這樣。
今後你就遵從為師的教導。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13788.en:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>To celebrate your initiation, I offer you this.
I look forward to working with you, <pc>.<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13788.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>「お前の入門を祝って　これを　さずけよう。
　よろしくな　<pc>。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13788.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>: 네 입회를 기념해 이걸 주마.
　잘 부탁한다, <pc>.<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13788.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>为了祝贺你加入，我就将这个送给你吧。
请多关照，<pc>。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13788.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>為了祝賀你加入，我就將這個送給你吧。
請多指教了，<pc>。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>

27397.en:
<start_lip_sync n00795 _normal m00001>Oh, right. You haven't got a thank you from me yet,
have you. Please accept this too. Truly, thank you
so much!<stop_lip_animation n00795 CLOSE_MOUTH>
27397.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00795 _normal m00001>「そうそう。私からのお礼も　まだでしたね。
　一緒に　受け取ってください。
　本当に　ありがとうございました！<stop_lip_animation n00795 CLOSE_MOUTH>
27397.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00795 _normal m00001>: 참, 저도 아직 답례를 안 드렸군요.
　이것도 받으십시오.
　정말 감사합니다!<stop_lip_animation n00795 CLOSE_MOUTH>
27397.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00795 _normal m00001>对了对了，我也还没给你谢礼呢，
请你一并收下吧。
真的非常感谢你！<stop_lip_animation n00795 CLOSE_MOUTH>
27397.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00795 _normal m00001>對了對了，我也還沒給你謝禮呢，
請你一併收下吧。
真的非常感謝你！<stop_lip_animation n00795 CLOSE_MOUTH>

42173.ja:
クエスト『<%sEV_QUEST_NAME>』を
クリアしました！
　<update_quedate><open_irai>

13791.en:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>Now then. I'm going out for a while. Let's go,
Zahokku!<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13791.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>「さて。私は　しばし　出かける。
　行くぞ　ザホック！<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13791.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>: 그럼 난 잠시 나갔다 오마.
　가자, 자호크!<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13791.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>好了，我先出门一趟。
走吧，扎霍克！<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13791.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>好了，我要暫時出門一趟。
走吧，札霍克！<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13792.en: <start_lip_sync n00789 _normal m00001>Yes, Priestess Helga. I'm happy to join you.<stop_lip_animation n00789 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13792.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00789 _normal m00001>「はい　ヘルガ僧正。
　よろこんで　おともいたします。<stop_lip_animation n00789 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13792.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00789 _normal m00001>: 예, 헬가 승정님.
　기꺼이 동행하겠습니다.<stop_lip_animation n00789 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13792.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00789 _normal m00001>是，历雅僧正。
很荣幸与你同行。<stop_lip_animation n00789 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13792.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00789 _normal m00001>是，赫爾嘉僧正。
很榮幸與妳同行。<stop_lip_animation n00789 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13793.en:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001><pc>, train yourself. In time, I shall return.
You may visit me as a priest.<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13793.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>「<pc>よ。修練を積むのだ。
　時が過ぎれば　私は　戻ってくる。
　僧侶となって　ここを訪れるがいい。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13793.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>: <pc>, 그동안 수련을 쌓아라.
　시간이 지나면 난 다시 돌아올 테니
　승려가 되어 이곳으로 와라.<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13793.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001><pc>啊，继续修行吧。
当时间流逝，我会回到这里的。
成为僧侣之后再来吧。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13793.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001><pc>啊，繼續修行吧。
當時間流逝，我會回到這裡的。
成為僧侶之後再來吧。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13794.en: <start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>I have high hopes for you.<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13794.ja: <start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>「お前には　期待しているぞ。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13794.ko: <start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>: 네겐 기대가 크다.<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13794.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>我期待你的表现。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13794.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>我期待你的表現。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
